DLG B
*rustle* Oh shit a bear!       ...         ..        .         No, it's a squirrel. Still, better try somewhere else.

DLG H
It took us an hour to hang our pack up there.

DLG D
Beyond the lamplight all is darkness, and quiet.

DLG P
...                             (Relief at last.)              ...                             (Please look away for a moment! It's rude to watch, even in videogames.)



tent dialog hack

DLG T
Our tent looks cozy, but... I really need to pee.

DLG t
Our tent looks cozy, but... I really need to pee.


lake dialog hack (opportunity to have multiple pieces of dialog?)

DLG l
Reflected in the lake, between tall mossy trees, the Milky Way. The stars are brighter out here.

DLG a
Reflected in the lake, between tall mossy trees, the Milky Way. The stars are brighter out here.

DLG k
Reflected in the lake, between tall mossy trees, the Milky Way. The stars are brighter out here.

DLG e
Reflected in the lake, between tall mossy trees, the Milky Way. The stars are brighter out here.
